pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw:
But it seems that bitbucket didn't handle the closing well as I'm not seeing the close commit in the pull request. 

I could strip the closing commit from my branch, do a merge to default instead and then close and let this pullrequest pull from my default. I guess that could work. But I'm really getting feed up with this bug -.-
content.html:
But it seems that bitbucket didn't handle the closing well as I'm not seeing the close commit in the pull request.

I could strip the closing commit from my branch, do a merge to default instead and then close and let this pullrequest pull from my default. I guess that could work. But I'm really getting feed up with this bug -.-
